item.title: At least 170 US hospitals face major flood risk: Experts say Trump is making it worse
item.description: When a big storm hits, Peninsula Hospital could be underwater.

item.title: Concussions might be early warning sign for ALS, study argues
item.description: Concussions and traumatic brain injuries (TBI) have been considered a potential cause of ALS, also known as Lou Gehrig's disease.

item.title: Tailoring and teamwork help hospitals reduce wasteful pre-surgery testing
item.description: Every day, patients with an upcoming operation roll up their sleeves for blood tests or get heart and lung tests and scans.

item.title: Women with surgical menopause may exit workforce earlier: Hormone therapy could help them remain, study suggests

item.title: 'People are going to die': Idahoans fear spike in insurance costs
